context_of_use: The urban mobility planner inspects historical traffic situations for past dates to analyze and compare mobility scenarios.
stakeholders_and_interests: urban mobility planner: Analyze traffic scenarios for informed decision-making.
description: Inspect historical traffic situations for past dates to analyze and compare mobility scenarios.
triggering_event: The urban mobility planner requests to view historical traffic data.
preconditions: The urban mobility planner is authenticated in the system.
Historical traffic data is available in the system.
postconditions: The urban mobility planner successfully views the historical traffic situations.
assumptions: The system has access to historical traffic data.
The urban mobility planner has the necessary permissions to view historical data.
requirements_met: The system shall allow the urban mobility planner to view historical traffic situations.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the range of historical data available for viewing.
main_flow: 1. urban mobility planner requests to view historical traffic situations → Traffic Analysis System retrieves historical traffic data.
2. urban mobility planner selects a past date → Traffic Analysis System displays traffic situations for the selected date.
